name: Gladiators and Glory
description:
Build the Best Gladiator School in the Roman Empire by building a gladiator school from scratch, training gladiators and gaining glory in the arena.

Features :


30 Different Gladiators
15 Different Gladiator Classes
5 Different Types of Attacks
10+ Different Arena Variants
10+ Arena Bosses
6 Special Gladiators You Can Manage
7 Different Stats to Improve Your Gladiators
Special Attacks for Every Gladiator

Gameplay :


A Turn-Based Fighting Game Set in the Roman Era, where you can develop your Gladiators and fight them in arenas to increase the glory of your Ludus.
